name: Squirrel’s First Winter
description:
Squirrel’s first winter will come soon, but he does not wish for his friends to leave. He relies on his friends Turtle and Finch to help him navigate the forest. Now he must trust in the words of Turtle, Finch, and Mama Squirrel and take on the challenges of the forest alone.

Includes:

  • 5 unique environments!
  • 4  adorable characters 
  • 9 Unique Expressions
  • 1 CG

Credits: 

Programmer: Yingying Kwok

Narrative:  Catherine Simmons

Environmental Artist: Miles K, Riotroast
